CustomField.formula: AND( RTL_RM_Name__c <> NULL ,RTL_RM_Name__c <> '00000' ,BEGINS( RTL_RM_Name__c, "00") ,RTL_Wealth_RM__r.RTL_Branch_Code__c <> NULL , OR(RTL_Wealth_RM__r.RTL_Branch_Code__c <> RIGHT(RTL_RM_Name__c, 3), NOT(BEGINS( RTL_Wealth_RM__r.Title, "Branch Manager")) ) )
CustomField.label: Is Reorg Wealth RM
